content: Like I said, I'll stay around to help <style=Highlight>settle</style> the creatures in. If you need anything, you can always find me here.

content: Now that we have the Ecohouse, the creatures have more space and a more comfortable habitat to thrive in. This could also provide better opportunities for ecological observation.
